user_request: Show the shopping cart on amazon. Add "macbook air" to the cart on amazon
screen_desc: The screenshot shows the sign-in page for Newegg. It allows users to input their email address to log in. There are options to sign in using Google or Apple, or to receive a one-time sign-in code. Users can also continue as a guest during checkout if they do not have an account.
history_actions: click on the "Chrome" browser app icon located at the lower right part of the screen.
